value.query: SELECT Id,%vlocity_namespace%__ParentItemId__c,is_root__c,Account.Name,LastModifiedDate,Product2.Name,Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__Type__c,Product2.Family, Product2.Id, Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__SubType__c ,%vlocity_namespace%__BillingAccountId__r.Name,Name, Price,SerialNumber, %vlocity_namespace%__LineNumber__c, Product_Family__c,Product_Family_Image__c, PurchaseDate,InstallDate,Status,Mobile_Number__c, %vlocity_namespace%__RecurringTotal__c,%vlocity_namespace%__OneTimeCharge__c,%vlocity_namespace%__EffectiveOneTimeTotal__c,%vlocity_namespace%__EffectiveRecurringTotal__c,Description, Quantity,Quantity_Remaining__c FROM Asset WHERE AccountId = '{{params.Id || params.id}}'  AND (%vlocity_namespace%__LineNumber__c LIKE '____') AND ((Name LIKE '%Plan%' OR Name LIKE '%Package%' OR Name LIKE '%Burst%' OR Name LIKE '%Sharing%') OR Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__SubType__c = 'Handset') ORDER BY %vlocity_namespace%__LineNumber__c
